'''''A Mari Usque Ad Mare''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Rhapsodia in the Ancient Sea]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to unlock all [[Teleport Waypoint]]s in the [[Nostoi Region]] and the [[Sea of Bygone Eras]] in Fontaine.

==Trivia==
* The name of the achievement is likely a reference to a Latin Vulgate translation of the verse {{w|Psalm 72}}:8 in the Bible: "''Et dominabitur a mari usque ad mare, et a flumine usque ad terminos terrae''" (He shall have dominion also from sea to sea, and from the river unto the ends of the earth).
** It is also the national motto of Canada as seen in its coat of arms.
